content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Greetings Max Müller. While discussing the rental price for this modern apartment in Duisburg city center, let me emphasize its prime location near essential amenities. Now, I'm open to your proposed price for this exceptional property. If we reach an agreement on your figure, I'll enthusiastically accept it. However, if the negotiation doesn't seem fruitful or doesn't align with my interests, I may need to reconsider continuing it, Max. TERMINATE if we fail to find common ground on the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
